description:
Jin, Team Masho’s fourth member, is a fast-talking Master of Wind who hates authority. He identifies with Yusuke more than any guy ever has, but with everything at stake, they must lay their friendship aside.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jin, stăpânul vântului. O încăierare pe cinste
風使い陣! 嵐の空中戦
